  {
    Type: Union,
    References: [
      $tbl_5,
      $tbl_6
    ],
    Columns: [
      {
        Parent: $tbl_4,
        References: [
          $col_2,
          $col_3
        ],
        IsVisible: true,
        IsExpression: true,
        RefId: $col_1
      }
    ],
    RefId: $tbl_4
  },
  {
    Type: Derived,
    Columns: [
      {
        Parent: $tbl_5,
        IsVisible: true,
        IsExpression: true,
        RefId: $col_2
      }
    ],
    RefId: $tbl_5
  },
  {
    Type: Derived,
    Columns: [
      {
        Parent: $tbl_6,
        IsVisible: true,
        IsExpression: true,
        RefId: $col_3
      }
    ],
    RefId: $tbl_6
  }
]
